title: Three Americans killed by IS gunman in Syria, US military says
Deadly Attack in Syria on U.S. Troops Exposes Growing Challenges for Country’s Leader
text: The attacks further complicate President Ahmed al-Sharaa’s efforts to unify the country and rebuild relationships with the international community, analysts say.

title: 3 Americans Killed in ISIS Attack in Syria, Trump Says, Vowing to Retaliate
text: Two soldiers and a civilian interpreter were killed while supporting counterterror operations, the Pentagon said. They are the first U.S. casualties in Syria since the fall of the dictator Bashar al-Assad.
